title: What are the testimonies of these women about the mesmerist Donato and his power of fascination?
first_phrase:
This last segment of the text refers to testimonies from Comte Enrieo II’Emahèse and Elise W..., who expressed their conviction in the power of the mesmerist, Monsieur Donato. Comte Enrieo attested to the efficacy of Monsieur Donato's science and claimed that many skeptics were unconvinced until they witnessed its effects. Elise W..., on the other hand, narrates how she was personally affected by Monsieur Donato, expressing her amazement and attesting to his reputation as an unequaled "fascinateur." Her testimony is a testament to the mesmerist's power and influence on people, and her hope to witness his work in future.

Summary: Comte Enrieo II’Emahèse and Elise W... attested to the mesmerizing power of Monsieur Donato. They witnessed the effectiveness of the mesmerist's science, and Elise W... specifically described how she was unable to resist Monsieur Donato's commands, attesting to his reputation as the "fascinateur sans égal."
content: Vous m’avez ordonné alors de me mettre à genoux et il m’a été impossible de me relever. Vous m’avez forcée à vous suivre, à danser et à rire sans qu’il y eût moyen pour moi de résister et sans que j’eusse conscience de mes actes. A la suite de ces expériences je n'ai éprouvé aucun malaise, et j’ai été obligée de me rendre à l’évidence. Je déclare donc hautement que tous les éloges que j’avais entendu faire de votre art de magnétiser ne sont rien en comparaison de la réalité et que c’est à juste titre qu’on vous nomme le fascinateur sans égal. Dans l’espoir, Monsieur, que l’an prochain il nous sera encore donné d’aller vous applaudir, je vous prie de croire à ma parfaite considération. Gand, le 10 mai 1885. Elise \V... P. S. — Si vous faites imprimer ma lettre, ne mettez, je vous prie, que l’initiale de mon nom.
last_phrase: In conclusion, the experience of being fascinated by Monsieur Donato has left me with no doubt in my mind that his art of magnetism is not mere charlatanry. Despite my initial resistance, I found myself obedient to his will without any consciousness of my actions. Monsieur Donato's unmatched abilities as a fascinator are truly beyond compare. I hope to attend his sessions once again next year, and I thank him for a fascinating experience.
